overview: Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, 1991. High school freshman Charlie is a wallflower, always watching life from the sidelines, until two senior students, Sam and her stepbrother Patrick, become his mentors, helping him discover the joys of friendship, music and love.
original_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
cast: Logan Lerman|Emma Watson|Ezra Miller|Mae Whitman|Kate Walsh
